title: Five Go on a Hike Together/Five Go to Mystery Moor
subject_group: Literature/Children's literature - Film and video adaptations
description: Episode of Series "Famous Five". Five Go On a Hike Together - The Five's carefully planned half-term hike does not turn out as expected when their path crosses that of an escaped convict. A mysterious message whispered through a barn window sets them on a trail to Two Trees, where they discover the lake of Gloomy Water and its hidden secret of treasure. The Five brave everything by launching a raft into the middle of the lake where they find themselves caught up in a thrilling climax involving the treasure. "Five Go To Mystery Moor" - The Five, on holiday at a riding school are attracted by the nearby Mystery Moor with its sinister reputation. One night Dick is woken up by the sound of a plane and looking out towards the moor he sees mysterious flashing lights. What is going on and who is responsible? The Five set off to find out and meet Sniffym, a little gipsy boy, who is involved with the mystery - a mystery that holds more excitement than they bargained for. Rated: G
